docs.snippet: With college basketball's regular season winding down, the bubble for the NCAA tournament has become pliable, teams moving in and out almost on a nightly basis....
docs.lead_paragraph: With college basketball's regular season winding down, the bubble for the NCAA tournament has become pliable, teams moving in and out almost on a nightly basis.

headline.main: The Highs and Lows of NCAA Bubble Teams
headline.print_headline: The Highs and Lows of NCAA Bubble Teams
